messages.message: @Loc not sure if image-tasks actually talks to OCR Ari.

Visual Refiner talks to OCR Ari if you ask it to (using the text rect annotation.. can’t forget the name of the tool right now).

Why talk to ARI when we’ve already OCRed the document once? This is the trick we pull for “last resort” OCR: we use a first-pass OCR to align the new document against a known template. Then we “wash” the cropped text region of interest in a variety of photoshohp-style filters, then we OCR them again, then we pick the best result according to a TokenMatcher function that you assign

What’s wrong with it?
Unsure.. will take a look as well..
